law.catch_line: The Judicial power of this State is vested in a Court of Appeals, such intermediate courts of appeal...
law.text: The Judicial power of this State is vested in a Court of Appeals, such intermediate courts of appeal as the General Assembly may create by law, Circuit Courts, Orphans' Courts, and a District Court. These Courts shall be Courts of Record, and each shall have a seal to be used in the authentication of all process issuing from it.
